skyux_select_field_add_new_record_button._description: Text for button to emit event for creating new record for the list

skyux_select_field_multiple_select_open_._description: The default button text for the select field when the user is allowed to select multiple values (plural)

skyux_select_field_multiple_select_picke._description: The default heading text for the select field picker when the user is allowed to select multiple values (plural)

skyux_select_field_multiple_select_summa._description: Text displayed when the user has more than the maximum items selected

skyux_select_field_single_select_placeho._description: The default placeholder text for the select field when the user is allowed to select one value (singular)

skyux_select_field_single_select_picker_._description: The default heading text for the select field picker when the user is allowed to select one value (singular)

skyux_select_field_single_select_open_bu._description: The default title text for the select field picker when the user is allowed to select one value (singular)

skyux_select_field_single_select_clear_b._description: The default button text for the single-select clear button

skyux_select_field_picker_close_button._description: Text displayed on the button in multi select mode to close form

skyux_select_field_picker_save_button._description: Text displayed on the primary dialog button to confirm selection of multiple items

skyux_select_field_picker_show_all_categ._description: The default category name for the select field picker that will display all possible results.
